metadata.Title: CVE-2021-39517 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in libjpeg through 2020021. A NULL pointer dereference exists in the function BlockBitmapRequester::ReconstructUnsampled() located in blockbitmaprequester.cpp. It allows an attacker to cause Denial of Service.

notes.Note: jdstrand> libjpeg-turbo is a fork of libjpeg8 mdeslaur> file doesn't exist in libjpeg-turbo eslerm> libjpeg-turbo/libjpeg6b/libjpeg8/libjpeg9 are from different codebases only libjpeg is affected

criterions.comment: libjpeg6b: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
libjpeg9: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
